r.d: Net_Wifi utilizes the command line tools "iwconfig" and "iwlist" to get information about wireless lan interfaces on the system and the current configuration. The class enables you to scan for wireless networks and get a bunch of information about them.
r.n: - Mark stable - Add support for noise level - Fixing bug #11343: fix preg_match for rssi value/signal strength - Fix protocol detection when no IEEE is given - BC break: IEEE not shown anymore in protocol version - Implement Feature #11358: more info could be parsed from the iwconfig and made available to php code. [kguest] - Switch to LGPL license - PHPUnit3 + AllTests.php for better automatic testing
